entries.name: loaded_from
entries.desc: The path this gemspec was loaded from.  This attribute is not persisted.

entries.name: activated?()
entries.desc: True when the gem has been activated

entries.name: base_dir()
entries.desc: Returns the full path to the base gem directory.

entries.name: contains_requirable_file?(file)
entries.desc: Return true if this spec can require file.

entries.name: datadir()
entries.desc: The path to the data directory for this gem.

entries.name: extension_dir()
entries.desc: Returns full path to the directory where gem's extensions are installed.

entries.name: extensions_dir()
entries.desc: Returns path to the extensions directory.

entries.name: full_gem_path()
entries.desc: The full path to the gem (install path + full name).

entries.name: full_name()
entries.desc: Returns the full name (name-version) of this Gem.  Platform information is included (name-version-platform) if it is specified and not the default Ruby platform.

entries.name: full_require_paths()
entries.desc: Full paths in the gem to add to $LOAD_PATH when this gem is activated.

entries.name: gem_dir()
entries.desc: Returns the full path to this spec's gem directory. eg: /usr/local/lib/ruby/1.8/gems/mygem-1.0

entries.name: gems_dir()
entries.desc: Returns the full path to the gems directory containing this spec's gem directory. eg: /usr/local/lib/ruby/1.8/gems

entries.name: lib_dirs_glob()
entries.desc: Returns a string usable in Dir.glob to match all requirable paths for this spec.

entries.name: matches_for_glob(glob)
entries.desc: Return all files in this gem that match for glob.

entries.name: name()
entries.desc: Name of the gem

entries.name: platform()
entries.desc: Platform of the gem

entries.name: require_paths()
entries.desc: Paths in the gem to add to $LOAD_PATH when this gem is activated.

entries.name: source_paths()
entries.desc: Returns the paths to the source files for use with analysis and documentation tools.  These paths are relative to full_gem_path.

entries.name: stubbed?()
entries.desc: Whether this specification is stubbed - i.e. we have information about the gem from a stub line, without having to evaluate the entire gemspec file.

entries.name: to_fullpath(path)
entries.desc: Full path of the target library file. If the file is not in this gem, return nil.

entries.name: to_spec()
entries.desc: Return a Gem::Specification from this gem

entries.name: version()
entries.desc: Version of the gem
